channel.title: Projects on Ken Jee
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ascari Chotoosingh

item.title: Project 1: Spendalyzer - A Bank Statement Analytics Application
item.description: Designed and implemented an interactive web application in Python (Plotly, Dash) that allows users to analyze their purchase history, understand their purchasing behavior, and receive recommendations based on an exponential smoothing algorithm.

item.title: Project 2: JEPI-ETF-Analysis-and-Predictor
item.description: Created a Python script for analyzing the daily stock prices of JP Morgan Equity Premium Income ETF (JEPI) and S&P 500 Index (SPY). The script includes data cleaning, merging of dataframes, creation of new columns, and visualization of the data.
